sense.def:
A venture
je nekaj novega, vznemirljivega in zahtevnega; vključuje tveganje.

seg.quote: The number of successful new business ventures is dwindling.

sense.def:
To venture into an activity
pomeni narediti nekaj, kar vključuje tveganje, ker je novo in drugačno.

cit.quote: podati se v kaj, spustiti se v kaj, lotiti se

seg.quote: I might actually venture into advertising if I had enough money.

gramGrp.pos:
REPORT VB
or
VB
with
TO-INF

sense.def:
To venture an opinion
pomeni, da previdno in obotavljaje povemo svoje mnenje, ker se bojimo, da je neumno ali napačno.

seg.quote: ‘I'd make a good husband,’ he ventured.
No one has ventured to suggest why this should be.

sense.def:
To venture somewhere
pomeni iti nekam, čeprav je to morda nevarno.

seg.quote: He wouldn't venture far from his mother's door.
